actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Tallgrass Prairies National Park in the State of Kansas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Tallgrass Prairie National Park in the State of Kansas. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Tallgrass Prairies National Park in the State of Kansas, and for other purposes.
